attributes.action: Hold a General Election to decide the next PM.
attributes.additional_details: Following the resignation of David Cameron and the unexpected decision to leave Europe, Britain is at a crossroads. We must have a say in determining our future and that means allowing the British people to elect a new PM in 2016. We cannot assume that the nation would naturally support Michael Gove or Theresea May or even a Conservative goverment. So let's decide in the fairest most democratic way possible.
attributes.background: The British people must have a say in who becomes the next Prime Minister. To do otherwise would be to deny us the chance to determine our future and would be undemocratic.
